DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability initiate LCZ696 heart failure patient reduce ejection fraction ( HF-rEF ) use conservative ( reach target dose 6 week ) condense ( reach target dose 3 week ) up-titration regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Initiating LCZ696 Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year ; CHF New York Heart Association class IIIV ; leave ventricular ejection fraction ≤ 35 % ; beta blocker Potassium > 5.2 mmol/l ; estimate glomerular filtration rate < 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 ; systolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg > 180 mmHg ; history intolerance recommend target dos angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor angiotensin receptor blocker Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
DOC.keyword: Heart failure , reduce ejection fraction , LCZ696 , titration , safety , tolerability
